title: Literally Came Back after two years, still in low priority queue
body:
What title says.

I don't know... I think that makes no sense. Like okay, back when I used to play 2 years ago, I had connection issues and sometimes just left. So... after two years, I rejoin and have to wait 20 minutes to play? Like... Don't you think that maybe... after a year it doesn't really matter? After two years? FFS Riot

replies.body: Well the system needs to see you improved. It's not based on time, but how much games you finished.

No, because then people would use multiple accounts to circumvent their punishment.

You broke the rules, you get to fulfill your punishment.
